colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B YAN LAG BRGYAD PA'I SDOM PA @004A *, ,'BOGS PA'I NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA 'DI NI, THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA BU STON RIN PO CHE'I GSUNG RAB KYI DGONGS DON LTAR 'JAM DBYANGS BLA MA DKON MCHOG CHOS 'PHEL GYI PHYAG BZHES SU GNANG BA LA GZHI BYAS, TSIG DON RNAMS DKYUS SU BSHAD NA RTOGS DKA' BAS NA, GSAL BYED KYI LHAN THABS LOGS SU KHA 'PHANGS TE, LAG LEN SNYING PO BSDUS PA 'DI NI, KHYIM PA RNAMS KYIS NYAMS SU BLANG BDE BA'I SLAD DU, ZA HOR GYI BANDE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG RGYA MTSOS BYANG TAL KHAR SBYAR, ,ZLA TSES LA, (BKRA SHIS PA DANG DGE LEGS 'PHEL 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
